title: Mosaic Gallery
shortDescription: A responsive mosaic grid for your photos.
longDescription:
**About** If you're looking to display your images in a unique way, our app can help. We think great images are better in the right context. For this reason we're using a dynamic grid to group your content. Because of this unique layout your photos are telling a story, together. By clicking on each image more information shows in fullscreen mode. This lightbox view makes it easy to explore richer details in every photo. You can even optimize the loading speed by using small previews for thumbnails.
**Standard Features** * Use an existing layout or create a new one. * Top customer support. * Add up to 5 items.
author: Widgetic

products.title: Mosaic Gallery
products.shortDescription: The Free plan makes it easy to try our app and explore its benefits before upgrading.
products.longDescription:
**Standard Features:**

- Use an existing layout or create a new one.
- Top customer support.
- Add up to 5 items.

products.title: Mosaic Gallery
products.shortDescription: The Premium plan removes all the constraints when customizing the layout and hides our branding.
products.longDescription:
**All Standard Features plus:**

- **No Branding** - _our Widgetic branding is removed_
- **Unlimited Items** - _add more than 5 images_
- **Items Padding** - _specify the padding between images_

proposedApp.title: Mosaic Gallery
proposedApp.shortDescription: A responsive mosaic grid for your photos.
proposedApp.longDescription:
**About** If you're looking to display your images in a unique way, our app can help. We think great images are better in the right context. For this reason we're using a dynamic grid to group your content. Because of this unique layout your photos are telling a story, together. By clicking on each image more information shows in fullscreen mode. This lightbox view makes it easy to explore richer details in every photo. You can even optimize the loading speed by using small previews for thumbnails.
**Standard Features** * Use one of our preset layout styles or create your own. * Customize the style to fit the look and feel of your website. * Responsive, works on mobile, tablet and desktop. * Top customer support. * Add up to 5 items.

proposedApp.title: Mosaic Gallery
proposedApp.shortDescription: A responsive mosaic grid for your photos.
proposedApp.longDescription:
**About** If you're looking to display your images in a unique way, our app can help. We think great images are better in the right context. For this reason we're using a dynamic grid to group your content. Because of this unique layout your photos are telling a story, together. By clicking on each image more information shows in fullscreen mode. This lightbox view makes it easy to explore richer details in every photo. You can even optimize the loading speed by using small previews for thumbnails.
**Standard Features** * Use an existing layout or create a new one. * Top customer support. * Add up to 5 items.
